text:
👉Three loud beeps means smoke or fire. Get out, call 9-1-1.
👉A single chirp every 30 or 60 seconds means low battery.
👉If chirping continues after the battery has been changed, the alarm unit must be replaced.
👉Learn more at https://t.co/k7ZcmGusHI 🔥
#FirePreventionWeek https://t.co/j7OBGG3nuV
